optimizations.name: Bundle Splitting
optimizations.description: Implemented granular bundle splitting for React, Next.js, Firebase, and other heavy libraries
optimizations.impact: Reduced initial bundle size and improved caching

optimizations.name: Dynamic Imports
optimizations.description: Added dynamic imports for heavy components and services
optimizations.impact: Reduced main thread work and initial JavaScript execution time

optimizations.name: Image Optimization
optimizations.description: Optimized demo images with proper lazy loading and quality settings

optimizations.name: Firebase Optimization
optimizations.description: Implemented modular Firebase imports and lazy loading

optimizations.name: CSS Animations
optimizations.description: Replaced heavy Framer Motion with lightweight CSS animations
optimizations.impact: Reduced bundle size and improved animation performance

optimizations.name: Performance Monitoring
optimizations.description: Added Core Web Vitals tracking and performance monitoring
optimizations.impact: Real-time performance insights and optimization tracking

nextSteps: Test the optimized build on mobile devices
Run PageSpeed Insights to verify improvements
Monitor Core Web Vitals in production
Consider additional optimizations based on real-world data
